title: New Zealand Luxury Off-Grid Vineyard Escape with Breakfast & Dinner Hampers
description:
Perched high-above Greystone vineyard like your own private eagle's nest, this glass sanctuary puts you smack dab in New Zealand's wine wonderland with the Southern Alps as your backdrop. Wake up to limitless award-winning wineries on your doorstep, spend your days bar-hopping through Waipara's finest drops, or get your heart pumping on valley cycling trails.

When hunger strikes, those gourmet hampers packed with local lamb or steak, artisan cheeses and Canterbury's finest produce mean you're sorted for romantic deck dining while watching the sun disappear behind dramatic limestone formations at nearby Weka Pass.

Just a scenic hour from Christchurch through rolling Canterbury countryside, you'll trek through native bush to reach your elevated oasis where vineyard workers appear tiny in the distance, and privacy comes standard with every breathtaking view.
